rationale: 'mass deaths' and 'increased deaths' are scales/metrics. No intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Since then, researchers and observers have reported mass deaths of elephant seals, as well as increased deaths of fur seals, kelp gulls, and brown skua at several other sites.
Since then, researchers and observers have reported mass deaths of elephant seals, as well as increased deaths of fur seals, kelp gulls, and brown skua at several other sites.
